text: Ara se nari niscaya'i tamra prati asakta hayechila, ara tini'o tara prati asakta haye paratena yadi na tini tamra prabhura spasta- pramana pratyaksa karatena. E'ibhabe amara yena tamra kacha theke hatiye dite pari mandakaja o aslilata. Nihsandeha tini chilena amadera ekanta anurakta dasadera an'yatama.
